!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Pilgrim* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Pilgrim. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. And to take the Trial of the Pilgrim, visit *Hermit Santiago in the Estate of Gludio*. Oh, and he lives with Peter at a farm. The *Mark of Trust* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Trust. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Trust, visit *High Priest Hollint at the Town of Oren*. And finally the *Mark of the Healer* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Healer. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Healer, visit *Priest Bandellos in the temple of Giran Castle Town*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30120/07.htm|Return]Â
